overview: Explicit Acts offers a glimpse of how graphic today's young women become when left alone together. Featured cover girls Emily Willis and Vanna Bardot just can't keep things professional. As this pair turns the art world upside down, their dazzling photo shoot develops into a scandalous office affair. Rounding out our executive lineup of experimental ladies are Cecilia Lion, Scarlit Scandal, Charlotte Stokely, Lilly Bell, Lulu Chu, and Kiara Cole.
title: Explicit Acts
